description: This file defines the ZoneStatusChangedEvent class, which is a subclass of ClusterCommandEvent. It models a specific event related to zone status changes in a Zigbee cluster, likely used for simulation or testing purposes within a Zigbee device or network emulation.

classes.name: ZoneStatusChangedEvent
classes.description: Represents a Zigbee event indicating a change in zone status, capable of generating its command payload for communication.

methods.name: ZoneStatusChangedEvent
methods.description: Constructor initializing the event with EUI-64 address, endpoint ID, zone ID, and flags.

methods.name: getCommandPayload
methods.description: Generates and returns the command payload as a byte array, formatted with little-endian byte order.
